---
title: ' '
pagetitle: 'Your Name'
output: 
  html_document: 
    css: "styles.css"
---

<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <title>{{ pagetitle }}</title>
  <style>
    body {
      margin: 0;
      overflow: hidden;
    }

    #Salamander {
      position: absolute;
      width: 200px;
      height: auto;
      transition: transform 0.5s ease-in-out;
    }
  </style>
</head>
<body>
  <!-- Replace "lizard.jpg" with the actual filename of your lizard image -->
  <img id="Salamander" src="salamander.png" alt="Salamander Image">

  <script>
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
      const salamander = document.getElementById('Salamander');

      // Function to move the salamander to a random position on the screen
      function moveSalamander() {
        const maxX = window.innerWidth - salamander.clientWidth;
        const maxY = window.innerHeight - salamander.clientHeight;

        const newX = Math.floor(Math.random() * maxX);
        const newY = Math.floor(Math.random() * maxY);

        salamander.style.transform = `translate(${newX}px, ${newY}px)`;
      }

      // Move every 1 second (adjust the interval as needed)
      setInterval(moveSalamander, 1000);

      // Move initially
      moveSalamander();
    });
  </script>
</body>
</html>
